candidates.title: Update rocket support to v0.5
candidates.body: As title; updates rocket support to the (recently stabilized) 0.5 version.

candidates.title: Warp Integration: Yet another web framework support
candidates.body: This implements `warp::Reply` for `Markup`, making it possible to return it from a handler and making *maud* more pleasing to use with *warp*.

candidates.title: Support `axum` v0.7 through `axum-core` v0.4 and `http` v1
candidates.body: closes #402

candidates.title: Upgrade to `syn` 2.0.0
candidates.body:
This PR bumps the `syn` dependency to version 2.0.0

It also removes the default features of `proc-macro-error` (which weren't used) to remove the transitive dependency on `syn` 1.0.0.

candidates.title: Set resolver explicitly in workspace config
candidates.body: https://doc.rust-lang.org/cargo/reference/resolver.html#resolver-versions

candidates.title: Release 0.25.0
candidates.body:
Closes #374
Closes #366

candidates.title: Bump axum-core to 0.3.0
candidates.body: This is required for axum 0.6 support

candidates.title: Bump itoa to v1
candidates.body: itoa 0.4 used `mem::uninitialized`, which is a very bad API as it's way of doing uninitialized memory goes against Rust's memory model. Starting from 1.64 it's slower because of the [forced memory initialization](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/99182/) it does to avoid the unsoundness

candidates.title: Remove default features from comrak (including clap)
Update `axum-core` depedency to 0.2
candidates.body:
Hi! Just updating optional dependency `axum-core`
(Thanks for the great crate!)

candidates.title: Update to axum-core 0.1
candidates.body:
Together with the new 0.4 release of `axum` we made a new crate called
[`axum-core`]. `axum-core` has a small API and is less likely to receive
breaking changes. Therefore its recommended for libraries to depend on
`axum-core` instead of `axum`.

So this updates `maud` to use `axum-core`.

Note this is a breaking change since `axum-core` requires `axum` 0.4.

[`axum-core`]: https://crates.io/crates/axum-core

candidates.title: Remove blanket `Render` impl for `T: Display`
Delete `maud_htmlescape` package
candidates.body: Replace it with a symlink. Cargo will automatically resolve this to a normal file on publish.

candidates.title: Update to Rust 2021
candidates.body:
Closes #308

Technically, the `.class` shorthand doesn't need a preceding space, but I add them anyway for consistency.

candidates.title: Bump dependency proc-macro2 to 1.0.23
candidates.body: - it won't build with 1.0.19

candidates.title: Remove Iron support
candidates.body: The Iron framework hasn't been updated in a long time. It still uses outdated versions of libraries like futures 0.1, hyper 0.12, url 1.7. We can clean up the repo by removing it. This will also slightly speed up CI.

candidates.title: ensure tide default-features are disabled
candidates.body: This ensures that maud itself doesn't dictate what features an author might like to use.

candidates.title: Add axum support
candidates.body: This PR adds support for [`axum`](https://docs.rs/axum/0.1.3/axum/)

candidates.title: Tide support
candidates.body:
This introduces support for Tide by implementing `From` over markup.
Unlike other frameworks, Tide does not seem to provide e.g. a trait
which could instead be implemented. However as demonstrated, this
alternative results in a simple, ergonomic interface.

Consumers may leverage Tide support by using the "tide" feature.

candidates.title: Test documentation examples in CI
candidates.body:
Closes #230

Closes #256

candidates.title: Remove non-Maud benchmarks
candidates.body:
There's already [template-benchmarks-rs](https://github.com/djc/template-benchmarks-rs), so we don't need to maintain a separate set here.

The Maud-specific benchmarks are kept, as they're still useful for testing future optimizations.

candidates.title: Add actix-web v3 support
candidates.body:
- adds actix-web v3 support
- retains v2 support
- thins deps by using futures-util

chosen_pr.title: Update rocket support to v0.5
chosen_pr.body: As title; updates rocket support to the (recently stabilized) 0.5 version.

chosen_detail.title: Update rocket support to v0.5
chosen_detail.body: As title; updates rocket support to the (recently stabilized) 0.5 version.

auto_merge.commit_message:
* update rocket support to v0.5

* added rocket upgrade to CHANGELOG.md

* fix documentation code for rocket v0.5

---------

Co-authored-by: Chris Wong <lambda.fairy@gmail.com>
